data.expected_result: Offline users are there like normal
data.short_description: Discord splitscreen (not full splitscreen, before actually allowing open app to be used) when the app was closed beforehand (fully closed) causes offline users to not show up
data.steps_to_repro: - Close Discord fully - Open an app and open it via split screen (where it can be closed by tapping on original app) - Go to a server where you would normally be able to view offline people - Try to view offline users
